text:
About me
My full name is Luis Daniel GutiÃ©rrez Renero. I have a Bachelorâ€™s Degree on Audio Engineering which I gained at Rec MÃºsica Centro de Estudios Musicales, a local university here in MÃ©xico. This university is strongly attached to Berklee College of Music @ Boston, they even have an official partnership.
My specialty on music was audio mastering for streaming on platforms such as Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon Music, etc.
Once I finished college, I made some mastering work with some artists like Luis Guinea, Rogelio Edel, Alec Roqui.  Spotify Playlist 
Meanwhile I was working with all these musicians I started a job at a Call Center named REDES. It is a Collection Call Center. Here I started a position as an HR with recruitment tasks. I gained a lot of experience on soft skills such as clear communication, being kind and practice empathy.

<!â€” Soy apasionado por el anÃ¡lisis de datos y la resoluciÃ³n de problemas usando herramientas como:

Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn)
SQL
Power BI y Tableau
Quarto para documentaciÃ³n y presentaciÃ³n

Actualmente trabajo en [Tu Empresa] y busco oportunidades para seguir desarrollando mis habilidades en anÃ¡lisis y ciencia de datos.
